FreeAccountCreated.Subject: Rank Ride: Welcome
FreeAccountCreated.Body:
Howdy partner! Welcome to
RANK RIDE FANTASY BULL RIDING
Thanks for joining!
Create a team for a chance to WIN MAJOR CASH PRIZES and GIVEAWAYS!
Now that you're an official Rank Ride member, you'll get exclusive email offers and hear about new Rank Ride Gear arrivals, big events, and special promotions.
Learn how to play today and get ranking!
EXPLORE THE GAME
REFER-A-FRIEND
SHOP NOW

© 2021 Rank Ride All Rights Reserved

AccountCreated.Subject: Rank Ride Account Registration
AccountCreated.Body:
Welcome to RankRide


Username: @@@Email
TempPassword: @@@Password
Hello Rank Ride Player

We do apologize to all our great Players. Because of a technical glitch with our Rank Ride Fantasy website, we have been down this week. Now that it is back up, we had to reset everyones password. To log in for the PBR Finals contest tonight, we request that you go to the login page and request a password reset on your account. Sorry for the inconvenience these problem have caused. We hope everyone enjoys the PBR Finals.

We have extended the Team formation until the start of the final round on the 15th.

We plan to have a new and more exciting experience going into the new year. We do appreciate you and plan on some big things next season.
Thank You Regards,
The Rank Ride Team
Got Questions? Reply directly to this email or mail us at info@rankride.com

InviteEmailSent.Subject: @@@FriendName invites you to join Rank Ride
InviteEmailSent.Body:
Hi @@@FriendName,
Your friend @@@UserName thinks you're pretty awesome, and so do we. Join the one and only PBR-focused Rank Ride Fantasy Bull Riding League.
We partnered with PBR (Professional Bull Riders) to give you (the fans of the most intense sport on dirt) the chance to raise the stakes and win cash prizes while competing with friends and other fans across the country.
Over $25,000 in prizes! Year-end champion wins $10,000 and a one-of-a-kind custom gold buckle.
Check us out for free!
The Rank Ride Team
SIGN UP NOW
